Room.Name: Salvage Boat
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a salvage boat and the captain seems eager to buy from you.
Room.LongDescription: The boat is larger than you thought, and appears a little worse for wear, but it looks quite seaworthy and apparently it can hold large amounts of treasure. A couple of nasty looking brutes are guarding the hatch which leads below. The captain is followed by a diminitive elf, who has a set of books under his arm. He is the clerk, and apparently does all the buying for the captain.
